original_text: After that, he may get up. He may be able to walk about outside, if he uses a stick. Then the man who hit him is not guilty. But he must pay the man that he has hurt. He must pay him for the time that he has not been able to work. He must also make sure that the man becomes completely well again.
korean_text: 지팡이를 짚고 일어나 걸으면 그를 친 자가 형벌은 면하되 그간의 손해를 배상하고 그가 완치되게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: After that, he may get up.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 그는 일어날 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: He may be able to walk about outside,
Then the man who hit him is not guilty.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그를 친 사람은 유죄가 아니다.

sentences.original_text: But he must pay the man that he has hurt.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 상처 입힌 사람에게 보상해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: He must pay him for the time that he has not been able to work.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 일할 수 없었던 시간에 대해 보상해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: He must also make sure that the man becomes completely well again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그 사람이 완전히 회복되도록 보장해야 한다.
